title: Can we talk about getting an S?
body: Despite being bronze, I think I play pretty well as an ADC (mostly Jinx) when playing against those in my own elo on a regular basis cause I've just played so much of her (not team deathmatch... taking towers, doing the most damage by enormous margins, ending games somewhat quickly). I got the mastery tokens required for mastery level 6 on Jinx within 3 or 4 games of her when the new system came out but now that I am mastery 6, I can't get anything higher than an S-. Can someone explain to me what makes an S or higher game? I feel like knowing this will make me a better player because I'll know what I need to do to be considered to have had a good performance in a game...

replies.body:
Getting an S doesn't win you games, nor does it make you become a better player.
check out this vid: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vX2mbqN9HfQ
